rules.name: Terror Descends
rules.lore: Bedecked in the flayed skins and leering skulls of former victims, their armour flecked with blood and gore, these reavers descend in a howling gale of enraged screams and soul-piercing shrieks. To look upon their ghastly visages is to feel a terrible and paralysing fear.
rules.text: Enemy units below starting strength that are within 12" of your units must always take a Battle-Shock test during the [Roll Battle-Shock](/rules/core_rules#roll_battle-shock) step. Additionally, enemy units within 12" of your units have -1 to all Battle-Shock tests.

spells.name: Eater of Dread
spells.effect: Roll d6, adding 1 to the result for each Battle-Shocked enemy unit on the battlefield. On a 5+, gain 1CP.

spells.name: Night Shroud
spells.effect: Select a friendly +Heretic Astartes+ unit within 18". Until the end of the Battle Round, it has +Stealth+.

spells.name: Willbreak
spells.effect: Select a enemy unit within 18". That unit must take a Battle-Shock test. If the unit is within Melee Distance, it must take a second Battle-Shock test.

strategems.name: Depthless Cruelty
strategems.effect: Until the end of the Activation, attacks targeting units that are below half strength or Battle-Shocked have their Armor Break trait improved by 1.

strategems.name: Bloody Example
strategems.when: After you destroy an enemy +Character+ unit
strategems.effect: Enemy units within 12" of, and visible to, your Activated unit must take a Battle-Shock test.

strategems.name: Relentless Terror
strategems.effect: Until the end of the Activation, you may re-roll Advance rolls, and your unit is eligible to Charge after making a Fall Back move.
